description: Riverside Shopping Complex (RSC) is located at Jalan Tunku Abdul Rahman, annexed to its sister property, Riverside Majestic Hotel in Kuching’s central business district. The complex includes a 24-lane bowling alley and cineplex.

name: Hills Shopping Mall

description: Sarawak Plaza is located at Jalan Tunku Abdul Rahman, adjacent to its sister property Grand Margherita Hotel, formerly known as Holiday Inn Kuching, the citys first international class hotel in Kuching’s central business district.
location: Sarawak Plaza Shopping Complex 291 Jalan Tunku Abdul Rahman, Kuching, Sarawak

location: 18, Jalan Tunku Abdul Rahman93100 Kuching, Sarawak, Malaysia
